about_the_game:
The Escape
In 1985 the company Dinamic Software, now defunct, developed what was one of its great successes: Abu Simbel Profanation, for the Spectrum, Amstrad CPC464 and MSX platforms.
The protagonist, Johnny Jones, had been transformed by the curse of Abu Simbel into a strange circular-shaped creature. To free himself from the curse, he will have to enter the tomb of Abu Simbel, in Egypt, and after overcoming a series of obstacles, recover his physical appearance.
Due the shape that Johnny has, he cannot use weapons and must take advantage of all his agility avoiding the dangers that he finds throughout the different rooms that make up the tomb, either by taking long or short jumps, depending on the situation in which he finds himself. find.

The Escape tries to tell the story of Johnny Jones's grandson who, after discovering something quite disturbing about his grandparents, decides to venture out to see for himself if his suspicions are true.

Help Johnny Jones Junior to discover the secret of his grandparents' lives in this 3D puzzle platformer.
